ComicInfo.Title: Mickey's Meatwagon; The Wart-Hog That Came In from the Cold; Dante and the River of Lethe; Dante's Inferno; Shithead Meets the Stinky Girls; Blobman the Magician; Circle of Jerks; Walkin' the Streets; Jesus Fucking Christ!; Dante and the River of Lethe

ComicInfo.Summary:
The Road Vultures go to a beach party hosted by Butch in Canada.
Philbert is fired right before he asks his boss for a raise. To make matters worse, he has lost the ability to bring out Wonder Wart-Hog.
Moscoso's figures spout a series of non-sequiturs in front of a Gustave Doré backdrop.
As always, Moscoso uses a series of non-sequiturs in a collage of figures from Gustave Doré and what appears to be communist Chinese comics.
Shithead goes to a pub and gets into trouble after meeting the Stinky Girls.
Blobman does some magic tricks.
A more overtly political jam strip this time out with the usual random occurrences interlaced with commentary about the "War on Terror."
Crumb talks about his youthful alienation and insecurities, the huge pull his brother Charles had on him and the various dysfunctions of other family members.
A bunch of swirling shapes swear at each other.
